name: google-calendar-agent
description: A Google Calendar A2A agent for AI assistants to interact with Google Calendar

skills.name: list_calendar_events
skills.description: List upcoming events from Google Calendar

maxResults.description: Maximum number of events to return (default: 10, max: 100)

query.description: Free text search terms to find events. Optional.

timeMin.description: Start time (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2024-01-01T00:00:00Z). Defaults to now.

skills.name: create_calendar_event
skills.description: Create a new event in Google Calendar

attendees.description: List of attendee email addresses. Optional.

endTime.description: End time in RFC3339 format (required, e.g., 2024-01-01T11:00:00Z)

startTime.description: Start time in RFC3339 format (required, e.g., 2024-01-01T10:00:00Z)

skills.name: update_calendar_event
skills.description: Update an existing event in Google Calendar

endTime.description: End time in RFC3339 format. Optional.

startTime.description: Start time in RFC3339 format. Optional.

skills.name: delete_calendar_event
skills.description: Delete an event from Google Calendar

skills.name: get_calendar_event
skills.description: Get details of a specific event from Google Calendar

skills.name: find_available_time
skills.description: Find available time slots in the calendar

duration.description: Duration in minutes for the desired time slot (default: 60)

endDate.description: End date for search (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2024-01-01T23:59:59Z)

startDate.description: Start date for search (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2024-01-01T00:00:00Z)

skills.name: check_conflicts
skills.description: Check for scheduling conflicts in the specified time range

endTime.description: End time to check (RFC3339 format, required)

startTime.description: Start time to check (RFC3339 format, required)
